descriptionShort: Basic and simple converter from Indonesia Rupiah to more than 150 currencies.
title: Convert Indonesia Rupiah

creator: Galileo Data Systems
descriptionHtml:
The currency converter is very easy to use. It is a classic converter

Allows you to perform basic, simple and easy calculations and operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication and division

The currency converter is free

It uses the exchange rates of Open Exchange Rates. The exchange rate is updated every hour

If there is no internet connection, the exchange rate of the last connection is used.

Historical exchange rate charts.

More than 150 currencies can be exchanged:
